designedBy: Designed and developed by Ronaldo Coutinho
enterStacks: Enter the stacks you work with...
enterTechnologies: Enter the technologies you are proficient in...
homeTitle: Welcome to Our Job Analysis Tool
homeDescription: This application was created to help students and developers craft an effective learning plan based on job requirements. By pasting a job description, you will receive a detailed breakdown of the required technologies and a personalized study roadmap to improve your chances of success in the job market.
instruction1: 1. Paste the job description into the designated input field.
instruction3: 3. Specify your current stack and list the technologies you are already familiar with.
instruction4: 4. Click 'Analyze Now' to get a breakdown and study roadmap tailored to your profile.
instruction5: You can also switch between light and dark modes, and choose your preferred language using the buttons available on the interface.
